sentences.en: A coward considers difficulties as a heavy burden on his back, but a valiant fighter turns difficulties into a stepping - stone for his advance.
sentences.cn: 懦夫把困难当作沉重的包袱, 勇士把困难化作前进的阶梯.

sentences.en: A valiant assault force does not fear a strong fortress.
Despite their valiant efforts, they were unable to save the child's life.
sentences.cn: 他们虽然很勇敢地努力抢救, 却没能救回小孩的生命.

sentences.en: Despite valiant efforts by the finance minister, inflation rose to 36%.
sentences.cn: 尽管财政部部长采取了一系列果决措施，通货膨胀率还是涨到了36%。

sentences.en: He had the fame of being very valiant.
He made a valiant attempt to rescue the child.
sentences.cn: 他勇敢地试着去救那孩子.

sentences.en: He mourned for his valiant  men.
He mourned for his valiant men.

sentences.cn: (虽然未能成功)那是很有价值的尝试.

sentences.en: She made a valiant attempt not to laugh.
sentences.cn: 她试图强忍住不笑出来。

sentences.en: She made a valiant attempt to laugh.
Tarr threw himself in front of a train in a valiant effort to save the child.
sentences.cn: 塔尔勇敢地冲到火车前去救那个小孩。

sentences.en: The valiant never tastes of death but once.
sentences.cn: 勇士舍生取义只经历一次死的痛苦.

sentences.en: These two, these valiant two, lived for the same dream and were gone only months apart.
sentences.cn: 这两位勇敢的斗士,为同一梦想而生,相继逝去,仅隔数月.

sentences.en: They talked modestly of their valiant efforts to keep the tanker afloat.
sentences.cn: 他们说起自己设法使油轮漂浮的英勇之举时非常谦虚。

sentences.en: This was the last time I saw this valiant Frenchman.
sentences.cn: 这是我最后一次见到这位英勇的法国人了.

trans.tran_en: very brave, especially in a difficult situation
